venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Captain John Carter, a US Civil War veteran, is mysteriously transported to Mars, where he gets involved in a conflict between two warring Martian factions. He fights Martian monsters, too (right). Based on the pulp novels of Edgar Rice Burroughs. John Carter of Mars is his lesser known creation, after Tarzan.

The movie opens on March 9. I checked the showtimes, and it looks like we have no choice but to see the 3D version. I hope that's okay with everyone. We'll meet in the lobby at 6:30 PM for the 7:00 PM show on Saturday, March 10.

As usual, anyone who likes can join me for dinner afterwards.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: John Carter
